conclusion: The refractive index of the tank material is √3.
The largest range of external angles visible through the material is 120°.
The diagram shows a tank with points A and B inside and points C and D outside.

premise: Refractive index n = sin(θ1) / sin(θ2), θ1 = 60°.
Using geometric relations, tan(θ2) = AB / BC.
